GapFillInput.Title: can and can’t
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the words in brackets into the correct form (can / can’t). Type your answer in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Excuse me. How can I get (I / get) to the beach?
2. I can walk (I / walk) to work so I don’t take my car.
3. Can you travel (you / travel) by tram in your city?
4. Students can listen|students can listen (Students / listen) to their classes on DVD.
5. We want to go to the city centre. Where can we get (we / get) off the bus?
6. People can't go shopping (People / go shopping) late at night in Cambridge because the shops
close at 7 o’clock.
7. You can go (You / go) to the university by bus.
8. My computer can write (computer / write) CDs.
9. Can people visit (people / visit) Mozart’s house on Sundays?
10. Get off that bike! You can't ride (You / ride) bicycles here!
